attributes.action: MAKE A PUBLIC STATEMENT to explain why the UK taxpayer is feeding foreign starving people while our own use of foodbanks is increasing.
attributes.additional_details: The REAL Prime Minister - Nick Clegg - attended Rio+ last week and committed the UK taxpayer to handing over GBP150million to feed foreigners who are starving.  This at a time when the numbers of UK citizens (who are paying the taxes that Mr Clegg is giving away) who are having to use charity foodbanks is increasing exponentially.  The taxpayer needs to know why the government prefers to feed starving foreigners in favour of feeding starving UK citizens.
